name: DUMMYNET traffic shaping script
short_description: This script is meant to simplify setup and management of relatively simple DUMMYNET traffic shaping on freeBSD. Serve primarily to translate user wishes to use ipfw commands, their interface is rather austere, intolerant and requires quite a lot of typin
